options.content:
# NodePool time to available

SLO 99% of NodePools are available in under 900s / 15min

# NodePool deletion duration

SLO 99% of NodePools are deleted in under 300s / 5min

# NodePool nodes status

SLO All NodePools have 100% of their nodes available

# Hosted Cluster deletion duration

SLO 99% of the hosted clusters deletion under 720s / 12min

# Hosted Cluster guest cluster resources deletion duration

SLO 100% of the hosted clusters resources deletion under 300s / 5min

panels.title: HostedCluster guest cluster resources deletion duration

options.content:
# Hosted Cluster time to available

SLO 99% of the hosted clusters are available in under 300s / 5min

# Infrastructure ready duration

Internal SLO 100% of the infrastructure ready under 30s

# Etcd available duration

Internal SLO 100% of the etcd available under 120s / 2min

# DNS reachable duration

Internal SLO 100% of the DNS reachable under 180s / 3min

# Hosted Cluster memory consumption

Internal SLO 90% of the hosted clusters control plane memory consumption < 8GB

targets.expr: count (sum by(namespace) (max_over_time(hypershift:controlplane:component_memory_rss{namespace=~"$namespace", prowjob_id=~"$prowjob_id"}[$__range])) < 8000000000) / count (sum by(namespace) (max_over_time(hypershift:controlplane:component_memory_rss{namespace=~"$namespace", prowjob_id=~"$prowjob_id"}[$__range])))
